Plot: THERE'S NO TURNING BACK... Picking up where the first volume left off- the unlikely duo of a television headed monster, RGB, and a stoic but ever optimistic child, Hero, continue on their winding journey to save the world. There are strange, frightening, and sometimes rather marvelous things in store, including a new travelling companion in the form of a sentient sock. Carry on falling down the rabbit hole of The Property of Hate, and find out where these curious companions end up next!
